fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player to protect from all attacks this night and another player to redirect the attacks to.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Flagger can redirect up to two attacks this way, if the flagger runs out of uses in the middle of a night, it will redirect as many attacks as it can at random.
- You know how many attacks are redirected each night.
- If you are out of uses, you gain one for doing nothing at a night.
